lead_paragraph: Peter J. Henning follows issues involving securities law and white-collar crime for DealBook's White Collar Watch.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)

snippet: A proposed rule will give the Commodity Futures Trading Commission broad authority to police "manipulative and deceptive" conduct in the commodities, futures and swaps markets.

headline.main: C.F.T.C. Is Set to Get Tougher on Fraud

abstract: A proposed rule will give the Commodity Futures Trading Commission broad authority to police "manipulative and deceptive" conduct in the commodities, futures and swaps markets.
